title: ranga banda
sahitya:
ranga banda manegeshrngAra nODirO hingadantha baDadana bhangavAgi hOyitO


caraNam 1    mAnAbhimAnava biTTU nAnA raNya tirugidare gENu arive uTTEnenalu huTTu doreyadu 
dAnavAntaka ranga baralu nAnA pariya paTTavALi tAnE bandu maneyoLu nidAnavAyitO
    caraNam 2    huTTiddu modalu nAnu meTTi tuLive dEshavella iTTenendare soTTa kivige gaTTi muruvu kANeno 
viTTala manege baralu shrSTiyoLagiladantha aSTa saubhAgyagaLa meTTi tuLidenO
    caraNam 3    hiNDu bandu baLagadoLu khaNDa maNNU mADidare diNDEyaLobbaLa tandu daNDe kaTTiro 
puNDarIkAkSanu baralu bhUmaNDaladoLilladantha heNDira bhOgake pracaNDanAdenO
    caraNam 4   hinde rangana bhajisade anEka bhangava paTTe munde rangana bhajisalu sukrta balavu 
tande purandara viTTalanna hondi bhajisalAgi bandanu bhAgyada siri lakumiyanoDa gUDi
